function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conflicting recommendations for people density in residential areas","Impact":"Increased risk of transmitting contagious diseases in closely packed residential areas","Mitigation":"Implement flexible urban planning that balances population density with public health concerns","Technologies":"Smart city technologies for monitoring and managing population density","People":"Residents in high-density residential areas","Owner":"Urban planners and city authorities"},{"Description":"Dependence on automobiles and transportation costs","Impact":"Increased air pollution and environmental degradation, leading to health issues and exacerbating contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promote sustainable transportation options and reduce reliance on personal vehicles","Technologies":"Public transportation systems, electric vehicles, bike-sharing services","People":"Residents in high-density residential areas","Owner":"City authorities and environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Increased demand for single-family houses due to pandemic","Impact":"Sprawl development leading to larger geographic areas and reduced community interactions, impacting public health and disease transmission","Mitigation":"Encourage mixed-use developments and walkable neighborhoods to balance demand for single-family houses","Technologies":"Mixed-use zoning regulations, community planning strategies","People":"Homebuyers and residents","Owner":"Real estate developers and urban planners"}]}
